item.title: Effects of local drug crisis evident in Kamsack, Sask.
item.description:
Effects of local drug crisis evident in Kamsack, Sask.

If the first step to recovery is admitting there's a problem, three First Nations around Kamsack, in east-central Saskatchewan, have reached that point. ​Leaders of the Federation of Saskatchewan Indian Nations and the Key, Cote and Keeseekoose First Nations sounded the alarm this week about a crisis in their communities.

item.title: Massive Attack, Azekel - Ritual Spirit
item.description:
Massive Attack, Azekel - Ritual Spirit

Massive Attack / Ritual Spirit A film by Medium / Robert Del Naja Edited by Anthony Tombling Jnr for Fantom Films Massive Attack - 'Ritual Spirit' feat. Azekel.

item.title: The Needle, the Cops, and How You Really 'Hit Bottom' | VICE | United States
item.description:
The Needle, the Cops, and How You Really 'Hit Bottom' | VICE | United States

The following is an excerpt from VICE drug columnist Maia Szalavitz's forthcoming book Unbroken Brain, published next month by St. Martin's Press. I opened the door with a needle in my arm. Seven plainclothes narcotics cops burst in, five burly men and two women, all shouting.

item.title: Why the British Empire Was Built on Rum
item.description:
Why the British Empire Was Built on Rum

For a long time, rum was a drink commonly issued to English sailors and soldiers. In the 18th century it replaced the traditional alcoholic beverages distributed to seamen and infantrymen, namely the more common beer and the less common wine and brandy.

item.title: Cannabis Drug Succeeds In Epilepsy, Doubling Value Of GW Pharma
item.description:
Cannabis Drug Succeeds In Epilepsy, Doubling Value Of GW Pharma

LONDON (Reuters) - An experimental cannabis-based drug has successfully treated children with a rare form of severe epilepsy in a keenly anticipated clinical trial, more than doubling the value of its maker GW Pharmaceuticals.

item.title: The Last Shadow Puppets - Aviation (Official Video)
item.description:
The Last Shadow Puppets - Aviation (Official Video)

The Last Shadow Puppets - Aviation (Official Video) from 'Everything You've Come To Expect' - the new album out 1st April 2016.

item.title: Karl Ove Knausgård: In America, an Alcoholic-In Scandinavia, Just a Genius
item.description:
Karl Ove Knausgård: In America, an Alcoholic-In Scandinavia, Just a Genius

Karl Ove Knausgård, a Norwegian now domiciled with his wife and four kids in Sweden, is perhaps the world's most revered living writer. Only, if he were American, the principal thing he and everyone else would say about him is that he is an alcoholic.

item.title: Homeless Man Dies In Jail After Being Locked Up For Marijuana Possession
item.description:
Homeless Man Dies In Jail After Being Locked Up For Marijuana Possession

Jeffrey Pendleton, a homeless man who won several legal battles over the criminalization of the poor, died in a New Hampshire jail on Sunday after not being able to afford bail. The New Hampshire Union Leader reports that Pendleton, 26, was arrested last Wednesday on a marijuana possession charge.

item.title: Can You Really Die from an MDMA Allergy? | VICE | United States
item.description:
Can You Really Die from an MDMA Allergy? | VICE | United States

"Molly" and high-profile molly-related deaths have generated much media attention in recent years, raising questions about the safety of the drug and the substances often sold in its name ( never assume molly is MDMA).

item.title: A common drug for ulcers could prevent alcohol abuse
item.description:
A common drug for ulcers could prevent alcohol abuse

There are almost no medicines available to treat alcoholism, but that might be about to change. A new study shows that a substance commonly used to treat stomach ailments may also hold the key to reducing the craving for alcohol.
